reviews.review_msg: First things first, he's pretty funny, and it makes the lecture not so boring. He tells you EXACTLY what's going to be on his exams. He only posts parts of notes online, so go to lectures. The exam is based on the review slides he shows in class, but also bits from the textbook about that slide that you wouldn't know if you didn't read it.

Hilarious prof!! So funny, and makes lectures actually interesting. Final exam was brutal, long answer questions was about documentary watched in class, so make sure you go over the notes!!! Online tutorials don't exactly help prepare you, and can be a drag. Term paper was fairly easy, materials and criteria was laid out for you. Review tutorial !
Way too specific of a marker for a first year course. He also makes so many politically incorrect comments, save your time and money!
Yes, neurotic in a strange mad hatter type way, i found it more amusing than anything. Like the class, didn't think it was too hard, thought he was a great guy.
